hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
source /home/test/.bashrc #Set the below parameters manually package_name="python3" published_version="3.6.4"
available_version=$(sudo yum info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) PRETTY_NAME="Red Hat Enterprise Linux Server release 6.9 (Santiago)"
if [[ $available_version == *"$published_version"* ]]; then echo "Version $published_version is already available in repo for $PRETTY_NAME." echo "Exact name: $available_version ... Failing" exit 1 else echo "Published version is not available in repo. Going ahead." fi #------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ sudo yum install -y patch make ncurses gcc gcc-c++ wget tar xz xz-devel zlib zlib-devel
wget https://www.python.org/ftp/python/3.6.4/Python-3.6.4.tar.xz tar -xvf Python-3.6.4.tar.xz cd Python-3.6.4 ./configure --prefix=/usr/local --exec-prefix=/usr/local make make test sudo make install
python_version=$(python3 --version 2>&1)
echo $python_version > output.txt
echo 'Python 3.6.4' > expected.txt result=`diff output.txt expected.txt`
if [ -z "$result" ] ; then exit 0 else exit 1 fi
